answers.answer: Hi,You may have some diabetic neuropathy but it is quite difficut to tell just based on your reported symptoms. The best way to diagnose this is by a nerve conduction study, so speak with your doctor about this.Another important concern would be poor circulation which is quite common in persons with diabetes, and can also be diagnosed with some simple tests.Definitely follow up on the Toxopasmosis testing.Also discuss a referral to a neurologist who can help determine several of these possibilties, and others that they would be mote aware of then I.Good luck and take care.
